channel.title: Esolang on wroot
channel.description: Recent content in Esolang on wroot

item.title: Whitespace Esolang Covert Channel / Steganography
item.description: I’ve been always a fan of esoteric programming languages (esolangs). These programming languages are generally made just for fun, mostly in universities or for challenges. Wikipedia describes as the following: An esoteric programming language (esolang, in short) is a programming language designed to test the boundaries of computer programming language design, as a proof of concept, or as a joke. The use of esoteric distinguishes these languages from programming languages that working developers use to write software.
